text: Fool on the Hill may refer to: * "The Fool on the Hill", a 1967 song by the Beatles * Fool on the Hill (album), a 1968 album by Sergio Mendes and Brasil '66 * The Fool on the Hill (ballet), a 1976 ballet by Gillian Lynne * Fool on the Hill (novel), a 1988 novel by Matt Ruff
title: Fool on the Hill
